column1: Commander of the Sri Lanka Army,

Before: 
Vijith K. Malalgoda PC J (PICA)  &

J.C Weliamuna with Pasindu Silva and Lakmini Silva for the Petitioner 
Counsel:
Arjuna Obeysekara DSG and Chaya Sri Nammuni SC for Respondents
Petitioner to  the present application Lt.  Col.  R.D.  Gamini Ranwala had come before this court seeking

b) 
Grant  and  issue  a  Writ  of Certiorari  quashing  the  decisions  reflected  in  P-lO  in  sofar  as  it  is

c) 
Grant and  issue  a Writ  of Certiorari quashing the  decisions of the  1st  Respondent  to  withdraw
the commission of the Petitioner and discharge the Petitioner from Sri Lanka Army thereof

d) 
Grant  and  issue  a  Writ  of Certiorari  quashing  the  proceedings  and  the  findings  of the  said
